articles.title: Summer's End Brings A Golden Marketing Reminder To Think Differently
articles.author: Allen Adamson
articles.summary: Hertz introduced the "Gold Squad" initiative, deploying Golden Retrievers at airports to greet travelers. This service aims to alleviate travel stress and create positive brand associations, differentiating Hertz from competitors focused on traditional features. Travelers are encouraged to share their experiences on social media, generating user content and improving brand visibility.

articles.title: In crowded voice AI market, OpenAI bets on instruction-following and expressive speech to win enterprise adoption
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: OpenAI launched gpt-realtime, a new AI voice model featuring more natural and expressive voices. This model is available on the Realtime API, and OpenAI also released new voices named Cedar and Marin on the same API, alongside updated voices for the latest model.

articles.title: Newborn Town Achieved 40.0% Growth in 2025 H1 Revenue, Profit Attributable to the Owners of the Company Surged by 117.8%  Aug. 28, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: Newborn Town Inc. launched Aippy, an AI-driven no-code community platform available on iOS.  Aippy enables users without programming backgrounds to build websites, mini-games, and other creative content and interact with each other. The company also experienced significant revenue growth from other products like TopTop and Heer Health.

articles.title: You Can Buy a Benchmade Pocket Knife for Up to 25% Off This Weekend
articles.author: Blake Bakkila
articles.summary: Benchmade produces high-quality pocket knives suitable for various tasks, from household chores to outdoor activities. Known for their durability and performance, these American-made knives are considered premium tools. The knives can be used to open shipments, cut fishing lines, or for camping.

articles.title: This Is The Most Popular Mac 'N' Cheese Recipe On TikTok, And It Uses One Seriously Genius, Recipe Developer-Approved Ingredient
articles.author: Micah Siva
articles.summary: Walmart offers 'Express Delivery' service, providing delivery in as fast as one hour for orders including groceries. Customers can use promo code EXPRESS to get their first Express Delivery for free. Tasty app can be downloaded to browse and save recipes.

articles.title: What made ZigZag Vodka a global winner at the Asia World Spirits Competition 2025
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: ZigZag Vodka, a part of Saltborn, has launched its debut vodka variants, including Original, Green Apple, Orange, and Lime, and won three silver medals and one bronze at the Asia World Spirits Competition 2025. These vodkas emphasize distinctive ingredients and production techniques, focusing on quality ingredients and flavor profiles achieved through select botanicals and natural fruit essences.

articles.title: Q&A: AI agents are redefining online shopping
articles.author: Dr. Tim Sandle
articles.summary: Syndigo assists companies like Unilever North America in improving product information delivery across retail platforms. Weber enhanced content and syndication, leading to improved add-to-cart rates. Klein Tools reduced manual syndication time, while Schleich increased its Content Health Score using Syndigo. Adorama also centralized content and streamlined vendor management using Syndigo.

articles.title: Supermarket staple makes major recipe change and shoppers will love it
articles.author: Owen Scott
articles.summary: Quorn has reformulated its entire frozen range to be free from artificial ingredients, removing Sodium Alginate. Greggs has also updated its vegan offerings by renaming the Vegan Steak Bake to Vegan Lattice, while maintaining the same recipe.

articles.title: Supermarket staple makes major recipe change and shoppers will love it
articles.author: Owen Scott
articles.summary: Quorn has reformulated its entire frozen range, removing artificial ingredients like Sodium Alginate and introducing new packaging. Greggs has renamed its Vegan Steak Bake to Vegan Lattice, maintaining the same recipe and ingredients. This constitutes product updates.

articles.title: High-Tech Promotions for Content Writers: August 28 Highlights Spotlight
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: The article discusses the introduction and enhancement of several AI-powered tools and platforms. Grammarly Business and ProWritingAid have expanded to include real-time SEO and style guide suggestions. Platforms like DALL-E 3, Midjourney, RunwayML, Synthesia, and Lumen5 are enabling custom visual and video creation. Visme and Piktochart are simplifying interactive infographic design. These AI tools aim to augment content writers' abilities and introduce new content creation approaches.

articles.title: Wonder Project Streaming Subscription to Launch on Prime Video in October
articles.author: The Wrap
articles.summary: Wonder Project is launching a new subscription service on Prime Video in the U.S. on Oct. 5. The service will cost $8.99 per month and aims to curate stories that restore faith in positive values.

articles.title: How The Honor Magic V5 Will Deliver Profit, Growth And A Foldable Revolution
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Honor's engineering and design are displayed in the Honor Magic V5. The new Android foldable, Honor Magic V5, has a strategic role in the foldables space.

articles.title: Amazon Labor Day Grooming Deals 2025: Save Up to 44% on Razors, Colognes, and Other Essentials
articles.author: Sean Zucker
articles.summary: Amazon is offering up to 44 percent off on grooming products like beard trimmers, moisturizers, electric razors, and colognes for Labor Day. The Panasonic Arc5 electric shaver, designed for sensitive skin, is available with a 19 percent discount.

articles.title: Groundbreaking prepaid AI solution captures industry-wide attention from leading executives and distributors
articles.summary: Integronn, Inc. launched My Instant AI, a prepaid card granting consumers access to top-tier AI models from providers like OpenAI, Google, and Meta. The product debuted at the All Wireless & Prepaid Expo and aims to provide secure and budget-friendly AI access, positioning itself as a first-to-market opportunity within the prepaid ecosystem. Integronn plans to expand the My Instant AI ecosystem in the future.

articles.title: New Car Wash Seeks Approval to Open in South Brunswick
articles.author: Jacob Turchi
articles.summary: Spark Car Wash will construct a 4,481-square-foot automated car wash at 3703 US Route 1, South Brunswick, NJ. The car wash includes a drive-through lane and 22 vacuum parking spaces. Spark Car Wash is seeking site plan approval on September 4.

articles.title: Claude AI Will Soon Be Able to Control Your Browser (If You Let It)
articles.author: Jake Peterson
articles.summary: Anthropic is rolling out a Chrome extension for Claude AI, which allows the AI to see and interact with everything a user does in their browser. This integration enables Claude to better respond to questions and even take over the browser to run tasks for the user, providing a more contextual and automated experience.

articles.title: How to Bring Back Vertical Swipe-to-Answer in Google's Phone App
articles.author: Khamosh Pathak
articles.summary: Google updated its Phone app with Android's Material 3 Expressive design language, introducing bigger buttons, customizable fonts, and louder accent themes. A key change is the new horizontal swipe gesture for answering calls, mirroring the iPhone's design but with a swipe left to decline and right to answer.

articles.title: £34 mattress topper that 'feels like you are floating on marshmallow'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney Shopping Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the MightySoft Mattress Topper, made from breathable microfiber, starting at £29.99. The mattress topper features strong elastic corners and is made from ultra-soft, hypoallergenic materials. With a rating of 4.4 from 5,595 reviews, shoppers have sold the mattress topper more than 2,000 times in the past month alone.

articles.title: Amazing Window Cleaners launches division for Christmas lights installation in Montgomery County
articles.author: Lizzy Spangler
articles.summary: Kroger will debut new features in its New Caney location on September 12. This suggests updates to the shopping experience or introduction of new in-store services.

articles.title: Progista: How Schick Japan Launched the First Total Grooming Care Brand for Men (Edgewell Personal Care Company)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Schick Japan launched Progista, a premium total grooming care brand for men, earlier this year. Progista is the first such brand from Schick Japan endorsed by professionals, offering a one-stop pre-shave skin solution.

articles.title: Cordless vacuum has won my heart with one simple feature
articles.author: Emma Slee
articles.summary: Ultenic has released the U20 cordless vacuum cleaner featuring a 600W motor, anti-tangle brush, self-standing design, and GreenEye technology for optimized cleaning. The vacuum offers up to 60 minutes of battery life and a flexible arm for cleaning hard-to-reach areas, and is currently available for £189.99.

articles.title: This Texturizing Spray Lifts and Tousles My Hair With Ease — And It Doubles as a Dry Shampoo!
articles.author: Danielle Murphy
articles.summary: Oribe is celebrating the 15th anniversary of its iconic Dry Texturizing Spray.  Additionally, Oribe has launched a perfume that replicates the scent of its Dry Texturizing Spray. Oribe also offers a thickening spray to create lift, build volume and elevate thickness.

articles.title: Nexulon Unveils Next-Gen AI-Powered Crypto Ecosystem With $NEX Token
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Nexulon unveiled a next-generation AI-powered crypto ecosystem. The platform is pioneering at the intersection of this ecosystem.

articles.title: I Finally Found a Robot Vaccuum/Mop I Actually Like
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: Narwal, a home cleaning robotics company, is releasing a new automated mop-plus-vacuum called the Narwal Flow. This device uses an AI chip for local mapping and data processing and is designed to be an all-in-one hands-free cleaner. While it excels as a mop, the vacuum function is less impressive, suggesting it's better suited as a mop-first solution.

articles.title: Aldi to release new Mulligan's Stout 'better than Guinness'
articles.author: Patrick Glover
articles.summary: Aldi is launching its new beer, Mulligan's Stout, on September 8th for £4.99. The new product receives rave reviews online, with customers favorably comparing it to Guinness, praising its rich, creamy, and flavorful profile.

articles.title: EnsembleIQ's 2026 Product of the Year Canada Announces Call for Entries
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: EnsembleIQ's Product of the Year Canada is accepting entries for its 2026 awards. Eligible products must demonstrate innovation and have launched between January 1, 2024 and October 31, 2025, spanning consumer packaged goods, technology, and financial services. Winners receive a red seal, research report, and marketing campaign access.

articles.title: Boat ties up with Hrdwyr, Tata Electronics for India's first locally packaged chip
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Boat will be the anchor customer for Hrdwyr Ventures' locally designed chip, packaged by Tata Electronics. This aims to differentiate Boat's products through this custom chip.

articles.title: Xbox ROG Ally: everything you need to know before its October launch
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Microsoft, in collaboration with Asus, has launched two new handheld gaming devices: the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X. The ROG Xbox Ally features Xbox branding and enhanced battery capacity, while the ROG Xbox Ally X offers a more powerful processor, increased storage, and a stronger battery. These devices aim to provide users with convenient access to their Xbox game library and other PC storefronts.

articles.title: Singapore to test autonomous AI agents for the delivery of public services
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Google Cloud announced new local access to its AI model. This update caters to both the public sector and businesses.

articles.title: 26 Travel Gadgets You Didn't Know You Desperately Needed
articles.author: Suanne Hastings
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products and services designed to improve the travel experience. Nightcore has launched a compact 10,000 mAh battery with fast charging. Zippo now offers the Battery Hand Warmer, a 5,000 mAh power bank that also warms hands. Pale Blue provides USB-chargeable rechargeable batteries, and Reliefband offers a tech-driven approach to motion sickness.

articles.title: Honor Magic V5 review: thinner, faster, stronger
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Honor's Magic V3 foldable phone features mature software and a thin design. The phone made an impression in the market.

articles.title: Apps to Help You Save money on Amazon
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: The Honey app assists users in saving money on Amazon by searching for discounts. It automatically verifies the purchase price of products from other Amazon vendors. If a lower price is found, the app displays an orange Honey button to alert the user.

articles.title: Mike McNeill's Diary for Thursday, August 28, 2025: Re-imagining why we're re-imagining Magnolia
articles.summary: Magnolia Meat Market reopened, featuring a new lunch menu and Loblolly Creamery products. The market also offers sliced meats, to-go salads and sandwiches, and other edibles.

articles.title: Dealzer Hydroponics Announces Major Launch: New 2025 Grow Box Line Introduced After Four-Year Hiatus
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Dealzer has released its new 2025 grow box line, which is the first major product line launch in nearly four years. The new models include Cash Crop 8.0, Grandma's Secret Garden 8.0, Growzilla 7.0, Cash Crop Soil Edition 2.0, and Magic Herb Dryer 4.0 and incorporate enhanced water changing pumps and refined design.

articles.title: PixVerse Launches AI Video Model V5 With Free Access Week
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: PixVerse has launched PixVerse V5, its latest generation model, alongside a new Agent feature. This new launch from the AI video platform aims to make video creation easier for everyday users. To celebrate the launch, PixVerse is offering free access to V5 for a limited time.

articles.title: The Honor Magic V5 is thinner and lighter, but do you need a foldable phone?
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Honor introduced the Magic V5, a foldable phone with a thin design, excellent battery life, and dual screens. The phone features superlative cameras and competes with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7. It is priced at £1,699 and boasts a 7.95-inch inner screen with stylus support (stylus sold separately).

articles.title: Honor Magic V5 first look – ultra-thin foldable tested against rivals
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Honor has launched its Magic V5 foldable smartphone, emphasizing its thin design and improved features. The Magic V5 features a 7.95" tablet when unfolded, and a camera system including a 50MP main sensor, 64MP periscope telephoto lens with 3x optical zoom and 100x digital zoom, and a 50MP ultrawide sensor, and 50W wireless charging. In the UK, the price is £1,699 and there is a £300 voucher on the Honor website for early bird buyers.

articles.title: Reviewers Carry These $10 Lens Wipes Everywhere — And They're Not Just For Glasses
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Wowflash introduces individually-wrapped, pre-moistened lens wipes designed to remove dirt, dust, and smudges from glasses and screens. Users praise the wipes for their effectiveness, convenience, and streak-free cleaning performance. The wipes are versatile, portable, and suitable for use on glasses, sunglasses, goggles, binocular lenses, and various tech screens.

articles.title: Sendbird launches real-time Voice AI Agent for instant customer support
articles.author: 기화가거 투자 인사이트
articles.summary: Sendbird has launched Voice AI Agent, a real-time AI-powered customer service solution. The service supports 29 languages, offers human-like conversation simulations with rapid responses, and includes features like real-time analytics and customizable voice tones. It adapts to real-world conversations and provides tailored responses, setting a new standard for customer experience.

articles.title: Samsung to reveal its latest devices at Galaxy Unpacked event on September 4
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Samsung will host a virtual Galaxy Unpacked event on September 4 to introduce new Galaxy devices, including a new member of the S25 family and premium AI tablets.  Samsung has launched a reservation promotion for the 'next evolution of Galaxy Tab', offering a $50 Samsung credit and trade-in savings.

articles.title: Newborn Town Achieved 40.0% Growth in 2025 H1 Revenue, Profit Attributable to the Owners of the Company Surged by 117.8%
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Newborn Town Inc. launched Aippy, an AI-driven no-code community that enables users to easily build websites, mini-games and other creative content. Aippy, designed for users without programming backgrounds, is currently available on iOS. Additionally, TopTop, Newborn Town's gaming-oriented social networking platform, delivered exceptional results, with revenue and profit growth exceeding 100%.

articles.title: M&S's affordable beauty advent calendar will launch on this date
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: M&S is launching its 2025 beauty advent calendar on October 9, 2025, both online and in-store, for £60. The calendar includes 25 products, featuring brands like Clinique, Estée Lauder, and Benefit, with packaging designed by Bella Freud.

articles.title: Seven new jobs as Greggs opens new city store
articles.author: Oscar Fisher Trainee Reporter
articles.summary: Greggs has opened a new store in Derby, introducing a new fiery chipotle chicken sandwich range and a new three-part breakfast deal. The store also offers deals on hot food and pizza slices, and provides options for delivery through Just Eats and Uber Eats, along with a click and collect service on the Greggs app.

articles.title: Wayvia Unveils New MCP-Powered Innovations to Help Brands Unlock Smarter Commerce Intelligence
articles.summary: Wayvia, formerly known as PriceSpider, has announced new AI-powered capabilities for its MCP (Model Context Protocol) product. These innovations are designed to provide brands with improved commerce intelligence, enabling them to better predict demand, optimize strategies, and act quickly on fragmented data. Wayvia's MCP eliminates the need for dashboards, SQL, or manual queries by enabling natural language access to live product and market data.

articles.title: Wayvia Unveils New MCP-Powered Innovations to Help Brands Unlock Smarter Commerce Intelligence
articles.author: Wayvia
articles.summary: Wayvia, formerly PriceSpider, announced a series of new MCP-powered product innovations that preview the next wave of AI-driven commerce intelligence. These AI-powered capabilities help brands predict demand, optimize strategies, and unify fragmented data. This release expands access to AI-native commerce intelligence, giving brands the speed and clarity to win in a constantly evolving marketplace.

articles.title: Wayvia Unveils New MCP-Powered Innovations to Help Brands Unlock Smarter Commerce Intelligence
articles.author: Wayvia
articles.summary: Wayvia, formerly PriceSpider, launched new AI-powered features to enhance commerce intelligence. These features include conversational analytics for natural language data querying, AI shopper agents for guided purchases, and self-service capabilities for instant brand control over product information. The company is equipping brands with tools and intelligence to improve shopper experiences and compete in a rapidly changing commerce landscape.

articles.title: Newborn Town Achieved 40.0% Growth in 2025 H1 Revenue, Profit Attributable to the Owners of the Company Surged by 117.8%
articles.summary: Newborn Town Inc. launched Aippy, an AI-driven no-code community, which allows users to easily build websites, mini-games and creative content. Aippy is designed for users without programming backgrounds and is available on iOS.

articles.title: Newborn Town Achieved 40.0% Growth in 2025 H1 Revenue, Profit Attributable to the Owners of the Company Surged by 117.8%
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Newborn Town launched Aippy, an AI-driven no-code community that allows users to create content like websites and mini-games. Aippy is designed for users without programming backgrounds and is currently available on iOS.

articles.title: Rob Kardashian's ex Blac Chyna's face is caressed by hairless cat in a bizarre AI advert
articles.author: Daily Mail
articles.summary: Blac Chyna promoted the launch of the 'Sphynx Skyn Collection' by Whitenicious, a skin-lightening brand. The collection targets areas like elbows, knees, and acne scars, promising to transform uneven skin tones. The advertisement was posted on her Instagram account.

articles.title: Beauty Breakdown: MANTLE founder Josefin Landgard debunks Scandi Beauty myths
articles.author: Aaliyah Harry
articles.summary: MANTLE is launching a new product in October called Organ Essence. This tissue-preserving innovation is inspired by organ transplantation science. The product aims to push boundaries in hydration and barrier support.

articles.title: Anthropic's auto-clicking AI Chrome extension raises browser-hijacking concerns
articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.summary: Anthropic launched Claude for Chrome, a web browser-based AI agent, on Tuesday. It is currently available as a research preview to 1,000 subscribers on Anthropic's Max plan due to security concerns.

articles.title: GYS Redefines Sleepwear With Bamboo Fiber Pajamas: Where Comfort Meets Conscious Living
articles.summary: GYS, an eco-luxury sleepwear brand, has introduced bamboo fiber pajamas designed for comfort and sustainability. These pajamas offer benefits such as breathability, moisture-wicking properties, and hypoallergenic qualities.

articles.title: All of Lidl's middle aisle bargains arriving this weekend including air fryer under £25
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Lidl is launching its 'Pastel Kitchen range' on August 31, featuring pastel-colored kitchen gadgets and appliances. The range includes a 2L Silvercrest Air Fryer for £24.99, a Silvercrest Espresso Machine for £79.99 (or £69.99 for Lidl Plus members), and a pastel-colored Stand Mixer for £49.99. Tower 9L Dual Basket Air fryer is also set to go available for £69.99.

articles.title: Bidet 101: Everything You Need to Know About This Modern Bathroom Upgrade
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Coway is introducing its Bidetmega 400S and 500S bidet seats, featuring a three-stage wash with customizable water pressure and user profiles. These bidets offer hygienic features like a self-cleaning nozzle, UV light, and WaterShield misting spray, along with personalized comfort settings such as adjustable nozzle position and seat warmth. The tankless design heats water instantly, and an Eco Mode reduces energy use.

articles.title: 6sense Launches AI Email Agents to Power Efficient, Personalized Pipeline Creation
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: 6sense has introduced AI Email, a new product designed to deliver personalized outreach at scale for B2B marketers. Powered by AI agents, it automates the entire email lifecycle, from writing and sending to following up and routing qualified opportunities. The Summer 2025 release includes AI Email Personalization, Native Email Provider, and Custom Agent Hours and Handoff Logic.

articles.title: Huawei to unveil Mate XTs trifold with stylus on September 4, just before Samsung's expected launch
articles.summary: Huawei is launching its next-generation tri-fold smartphone, the Mate XTs, on September 4, 2025. The Mate XTs features a Z-style folding system with a large OLED panel, stylus support, and runs on HarmonyOS 5.1. It is expected to have a price around $2,000.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra: A flagship phone with unfulfilled AI promises
articles.author: Stephen Radochia
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Ultra features Galaxy AI, but its performance isn't meeting expectations. The AI assistant, Now Brief, provides generic information, and multimodal experiences require precise prompting. The device is a decent upgrade from the Galaxy S22 Ultra, but Samsung needs to improve Galaxy AI to make it a selling point.

articles.title: 27 unique and useful gifts that new dads will love
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Miku is offering its Smart Baby Monitor, which tracks baby's sleep and breathing, for $399 with a discount code. Several companies are mentioned with their specific product offerings for new dads: Takeya with its Deluxe Cold Brew Iced Coffee Maker, Colectivo Coffee offering single-origin beans, and Ergobaby promoting its Omni 360 All-in-One carrier. The gift suggestions extend to items facilitating convenience and comfort for both the baby and the father, like Instant Pot for easy cooking and Tommy John's Second Skin Lounge Pants for comfort.

articles.title: Nvidia's Bold Robotics Leap: Jetson AGX Thor Brings the ‘Robot Brain' Revolution to Industry
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Nvidia has introduced the Jetson AGX Thor developer kit, priced at $3,499, powered by Blackwell GPU processors and 128GB memory, targeting the robotics industry. This new chip is significantly faster than its predecessor, and Nvidia also offers Thor T5000 modules for ready-to-ship robots. Early adopters like Amazon, Meta, and Agility Robotics are already building on Jetson chips.

articles.title: Adobe Is Making PDF Documents More Accessible To Screen Readers With New AI-Powered 'Liquid Mode
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Adobe introduced Liquid Mode, a new technology designed to enhance the accessibility of PDFs on mobile devices for screen readers like Apple's VoiceOver. This update aims to improve the reading experience for users with visual impairments.

articles.title: Precise Marketing
articles.author: Upendra Mishra
articles.summary: Zoom combined frictionless Customer Experience with proactive Customer Success. They provided an intuitive and reliable interface, simple onboarding, and instant support. Enterprise customers benefited from dedicated Success Managers, resulting in high customer retention and revenue.

articles.title: Yango Group receives Tier S Dubai AI Seal certification, joining select group of verified AI leaders
articles.summary: Yango Group launched YangoAI, a suite of advanced AI technologies tailored to the GCC region. This launch follows Yango Group receiving the Dubai AI Seal at Tier S for its AI solutions. The company already provides AI-powered services, including smart speakers and autonomous delivery robots, across the UAE.

articles.title: Adastra Recognized as an Emerging Visionary in Gartner® Emerging Market Quadrant™ for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Adastra has been recognized as an Emerging Visionary in the Gartner ® Emerging Market Quadrant™ for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services. The company focuses on helping organizations with their AI transformation journey by delivering reliable and manageable AI tools.

articles.title: Adastra Recognized as an Emerging Visionary in Gartner® Emerging Market Quadrant™ for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Adastra has been recognized as an Emerging Visionary in the Gartner Emerging Market Quadrant for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services. This highlights the company's dedication to delivering AI tools that are reliable, manageable, and make a tangible difference. Adastra empowers enterprise clients to unlock business value through data innovation, operational excellence, and smart customer engagement.

articles.title: This new Android feature could change how you use the Play Store for good
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Google is introducing an auto-open toggle within the Play Store, allowing Android users to automatically launch newly downloaded apps after installation. This feature, currently available on devices like the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Pixel 9 Pro XL, presents a notification with a five-second countdown before opening the app.

articles.title: Hisense Unveils Revolutionary UX ULED Series in India
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Hisense has launched its UX ULED TV series in India, featuring RGB Mini-LED technology for enhanced visual precision. The UX series, available in 100'' and 116'' models, also includes a solar-powered, USB-C rechargeable remote to promote sustainability.

articles.title: Amazon slashes Ninja air fryer by 30% in brand beating deal
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Ninja Foodi Max 9.5L dual zone air fryer to £169.99. This air fryer features dual-drawer design, six cooking functions, and is designed to serve up to eight people. It also consumes 65% less energy than conventional fan ovens.

articles.title: Why we are expanding to UK, Europe — Nigeria's baby food, Moppet
articles.author: Chima Chima
articles.summary: Moppet Foods is expanding its product reach by launching in the UK and European markets via Amazon, offering products like Moppet NutriBlend Peanut, Mixgrain, Veggies Cereal, and Nutmeal Cereal. They are also partnering with UK health institutions like the Speech and Language Therapy (SLT) and the National Health Service (NHS). Furthermore, Moppet Foods is increasing its presence in Nigeria by launching in Grandsquare, Market Square, and Hartleys retail chains.

articles.title: Boyd Unveils Plug-And-Play Tool To Speed Up Liquid-Cooled Data Centre Deployment
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Boyd has launched a new thermal testing tool called the Rack Emulator, which helps validate the performance of liquid cooling systems in AI data centers. The Rack Emulator simulates rack pressure drop and heat dissipation and is available for order now, with shipments commencing in September. The tool ensures safe and efficient operation of data centers by testing coolant distribution units and validating thermal performance before connecting to IT equipment.

articles.title: Brand new Acela train cars will be serving Providence station. Here's a look.
articles.summary: Acelas will begin carrying paying customers for the first time Thursday morning, marking the introduction or launch of a new service.

articles.title: Say Hello to the Latest Benz OwnerPriscilla Ojo
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: Priscilla Ojo acquired a brand new Mercedes Benz. She described the purchase as her "first big purchase."

articles.title: WhatsApp Rolls Out AI Writing Help to Refine Chats With Privacy in Focus
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: WhatsApp has introduced AI Writing Help, an AI-powered feature that suggests alternative ways to rephrase messages for different tones, including professional, funny, supportive, and clearer versions. The feature, currently available in English for users in the United States and select countries, can be enabled in WhatsApp settings.

articles.title: Nothing caught using stock photography as sample Phone 3 camera photos – but it was seemingly an accident
articles.author: James Rogerson
articles.summary: Nothing Phone 3 demo units were displaying stock photos as if taken by the phone itself due to an 'unfortunate oversight' during the initial demo unit submission, which required placeholder images four months before launch. The company is investigating to prevent recurrence before the Nothing Phone 3 official launch.

articles.title: New eSIM launched that will save travellers money on data roaming charges abroad
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A new eSIM service rivals existing deals from Vodafone, EE, and O2.

articles.title: The New RS Export App Puts the World at Your Fingertips
articles.author: APO
articles.summary: RS South Africa, a global product and service solutions provider, has launched the new RS Export Mobile App. This app is designed to empower industrial customers and suppliers involved in designing, building, or maintaining industrial equipment and facilities.

articles.title: WhatsApp new AI Writing Help feature: What is it and how to use, full details
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: WhatsApp introduced a new AI Writing Help feature. The specifics of the features and it's functions are outlined.

articles.title: Sky Sports Premier League plan is 63p a day with cheaper TV streaming upgrade
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Sky is offering a discounted Sky Sports package for £19 per month when purchasing a new Sky Glass smart TV. This deal, available with Sky Glass Air and Gen 2 models, grants access to nine Sky Sports channels. The offer coincides with Sky increasing its Premier League coverage to 215 games this season.

articles.title: Nykaa takes its beauty battle global to take on cosmetic giants
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd., operating as Nykaa, has launched Kay Beauty in the UK through Ulta Beauty-owned Space NK. Developed in partnership with Katrina Kaif, Kay Beauty debuted across 13 Space NK stores and its online platform. FSN is also considering expansion into the US, Middle East, and certain Asian markets.

articles.title: Boyd Launches Rack Emulator To Validate Liquid Cooling System Performance For AI Infrastructure
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Boyd launched the Rack Emulator, a new thermal testing tool, to help clients efficiently deploy liquid-cooled data centers. This device simulates rack performance and pressure drop to validate thermal performance before connecting to IT equipment, ensuring safe and efficient data center operation.

articles.title: Aldi to release new Mulligan's Stout 'better than Guinness'
articles.author: Patrick Glover
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new Mulligan's Stout on September 8 for £4.99, which is cheaper than Guinness. Additionally, Aldi will launch a new Specially Selected Chocolate Stout (£1.79, 500ml) on the same date. However, Aldi has discontinued its Harvest Morn Top Twists due to range review.

articles.title: Charlotte Tilbury's new 'airbrush effect' foundation is already being called the BEST for a flawless finish - and it actually delivers
articles.author: LYDIA WHEATLEY
articles.summary: Charlotte Tilbury has released the new Airbrush Flawless Foundation, a matte foundation with full coverage and a natural finish, priced at £39. Additionally, the company introduced the Life Changing Lip Mask for healthier lips, and the Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray Matte, infused with PoreAway™ Technology, for an airbrushed look and matte finish priced at £32. These products aim to provide flawless skin and youthful lips.

articles.title: LG to unveil 2 new robot vacuums at IFA 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics will unveil two new robot vacuum cleaners, the 'Hidden Station' and the 'Objet Station', at IFA 2025. These models feature steam functionality and AI-based object recognition. Samsung Electronics is also planning to launch a new robot vacuum later this year, emphasizing IoT security.

articles.title: WhatsApp new AI Writing Help feature: What is it and how to use, full details
articles.summary: WhatsApp has launched a new AI-powered feature called 'AI Writing Help' that assists users in rephrasing, proofreading, and adjusting the tone of their messages directly within the app. This feature, powered by Meta's Private Processing technology, offers suggestions across various styles and is currently available in English for users in the United States and select countries, with plans to expand to more languages and regions.

articles.title: WhatsApp launches new AI feature on messages
articles.summary: WhatsApp, owned by Meta, is introducing 'Writing Help,' a new AI feature that allows users to rephrase, proofread, or adjust the tone of their messages. The feature uses Meta's Private Processing technology to provide AI-generated suggestions while maintaining user privacy, and can rewrite messages in various styles, accessible via a pencil icon in the app.

articles.title: Stay Groomed and Hygienic This Rainy Season with KAI India's Nail Clipper
articles.author: Mansi Praharaj
articles.summary: KAI India introduces its 100% stainless steel nail clipper, the KAI Tsumekiri, designed with Japanese craftsmanship for precision, hygiene, and style. The clipper features a sleek design, reinforced lever, stainless steel body, integrated nail file, and grime remover, addressing monsoon-related grooming needs. The KAI India Nail Clipper is available on www.kaiindiaonline.com, e-commerce platforms, and offline stores, and comes in seven colors.

articles.title: Barclays urgent warning as just hours left to claim £175 payment
articles.author: Nicholas Dawson
articles.summary: Barclays is offering a £175 bonus for new customers who switch to a Barclays Bank Account or Premier Current Account through the Barclays app. Customers need to complete the switch within 30 days and deposit at least £1,500 into the new account to qualify. The offer is available until August 28 for accounts opened after July 15.

articles.title: Lovehoney's holiday advent calendars are back
articles.author: Tabitha Britt
articles.summary: Lovehoney announced its 2025 lineup of advent calendars, expanding its collection to include a range of options from beginner-friendly sets to premium calendars. The Lovehoney Enjoy 24-Day Advent Calendar, priced at $109, includes $260.76 worth of pleasure products, including a Womanizer Mini 2.

articles.title: Gadget £130 cheaper than Ninja makes 'fresh homemade soup in minutes'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Morphy Richards offers the Clarity 1.6L Soup Maker, featuring a large capacity, user-friendly display, and keep-warm function. Currently priced at £49.99, it presents a cheaper alternative to competitors like the Ninja Foodi Blender & Soup Maker and has an automatic 'Clean' program.

articles.title: Soup maker £130 cheaper than Ninja for 'fresh homemade soup'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Morphy Richards offers the Clarity 1.6L Soup Maker for £49.99, reduced from £89.99. The soup maker features a 1.6-liter jug, LED countdown, and a keep-warm function. The product has received positive reviews for its ease of use and quick soup-making capabilities and alternatives like Tower 1.6L Soup Maker Saute Function for £69.99 and Salter Soup Maker for £55 from Argos are available.

articles.title: I've secretly been wearing Charlotte Tilbury's new foundation for weeks- here's my verdict
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: Charlotte Tilbury launched its new Airbrush Flawless Foundation, which promises to boost skin hydration by 155% after one hour of wear. The foundation features 24-hour wear, a 3D matte finish, and skin-loving ingredients. The new matte setting spray also launched.

articles.title: WhatsApp releases AI-powered ‘Writing Help' to assist users with editing and rewriting messages
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: WhatsApp launched a new AI feature called 'Writing Help' on August 27. This feature allows users to edit, rewrite, or modify the tone of their conversations using AI-generated suggestions. The feature aims to help users correct grammar, phrase messages correctly, and change the tone while maintaining user privacy through Meta's Private Processing technology.

articles.title: In the domestic robot vacuum cleaner market, which accounts for nearly 60% of Chinese companies, dom..
articles.author: Lee Deok-Ju
articles.summary: LG Electronics is set to introduce new 'Hidden Station' and 'Object Station' robot vacuum cleaners at IFA 2025, featuring built-in designs and steam functions. Samsung Electronics will also unveil its 'Bespoke AI Jetbot Steam' robot cleaner, emphasizing security and steam capabilities. Both companies aim to compete with Chinese manufacturers in the domestic market by offering advanced features and design.

articles.title: Samsung to host Galaxy event ahead of iPhone launch
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Samsung hosted the Galaxy Unpacked event in July. Samsung unveiled brand-new premium phones at the event.

articles.title: Nykaa eyes growth in UK and beyond
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Kay Beauty is launching its products in the UK through a partnership with Space NK, which is owned by Ulta Beauty Inc. This launch introduces Kay Beauty products to the UK market.

articles.title: LG CNS, Naver team up to enhance AI-driven ad efficiency
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: LG CNS is partnering with Naver to enhance artificial intelligence (AI)-powered advertising optimization services for online shopping. This collaboration aims to create an improved advertising ecosystem and develop solutions beneficial to various advertisers, including small and medium-sized businesses.

articles.title: The Future of Dessert is Here: Rollney Unveils Revolutionary Robotic Ice Cream Machine in Singapore, Forging a New Path for F&B Entrepreneurs
articles.summary: Rollney has launched its Royal Chocolate Robotic Ice Cream Machine, an automated system designed to address challenges like staff shortages and high costs. This innovative machine allows franchise partners to manage businesses remotely and is offered with an introductory franchise package for the first 10 partners, starting at $28,000.

articles.title: TaiwanICDF and St. Lucia Jointly Launch E-Commerce Platform to Boost Youth Entrepreneurship and the Digital Economy
articles.author: 中央通訊社 Central News Agency
articles.summary: TaiwanICDF, in collaboration with St. Lucia's Youth Economy Agency (YEA), launched the 'YEA E-Commerce Platform' to promote youth entrepreneurship and digital economic development. The platform enables young entrepreneurs to establish online stores, market products, and receive orders, aiming to lower entrepreneurship barriers and enhance global competitiveness for youth and women in St. Lucia.

articles.title: Nykaa goes to the UK with Katrina Kaif's Kay Beauty brand of cosmetics
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Nykaa is expanding its overseas business. Kay Beauty, a cosmetics brand developed by Katrina Kaif in association with Nykaa, is launching in the US, Middle East, and certain Asian markets.

articles.title: Xbox Game Pass experience set to get better for more gamers
articles.author: Pop Culture
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new initiative for Game Pass Core and Game Pass Standard members, offering limited access to certain games via cloud and PC. This benefit adds cloud gaming support to all games in the Core and Standard libraries and allows players to use cloud gaming for games they own that support the feature. Microsoft also plans to make PC versions of some Core and Standard games available.

articles.title: WhatsApp launches AI-powered ‘writing help' feature to help you adjust your message tone: What is the feature and how to use it
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: WhatsApp launched a new AI-powered "Writing Help" feature that allows users to rephrase messages and adjust the tone before sending. The new feature, powered by Meta's Private Processing technology, suggests message restyling with options such as professional, funny, or supportive tones.

articles.title: Plaud launches Plaud Note Pro: The world's first AI note-taker enabling real-time human-AI alignment
articles.author: PLAUD.AI
articles.summary: Plaud, an AI note-taker brand, launched Plaud Note Pro. This is the world's first AI note-taker enabling real-time human-AI alignment. The launch indicates a new product offering from Plaud in the AI note-taking market.

articles.title: Tesla teases new product launch for tomorrow: What is it?
articles.summary: Tesla is teasing the potential launch of a new Model Y Performance vehicle, indicated by a cryptic post on X referencing a spoiler. This high-performance version, previously discontinued after a January refresh, is anticipated to make a comeback, potentially launching first in Europe and the Middle East. The launch timeline is uncertain, but the Model Y Performance sales estimates suggest a smaller impact on Tesla's overall business compared to other models.

articles.title: Realme's New Phones Get 15,000mAh Battery And Cooling Fan But You Can't Buy Them
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Realme showcased two new concept phones: one featuring a 15,000mAh battery that doubles as a power bank, and another with a cooling fan system to reduce heat by 6 degrees Celsius for gamers. While specifications are not yet confirmed, these concepts were presented at the Realme 828 festival.

articles.title: LG Launches the StanbyME 2: A New Era of Portable Entertainment
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched the StanbyME 2, a new generation of its innovative product line.

articles.title: Google goes live with on-premise Gemini AI
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Google's Gemini will be placed on customers' equipment, expanding use cases such as translation services within companies.

articles.title: Khloe Kardashian showcases her toned midsection in new loungewear collection for Good American label
articles.author: Daily Mail
articles.summary: Good American launched its new Good Essentials collection on Thursday morning. The launch was teased with promotional content.

articles.title: Samsung to launch new S25 model, tablets on 04 September
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will launch new Galaxy range devices, including premium AI tablets and the Galaxy S25 smartphone, on September 4th. The launch event, named 'Galaxy Unpacked,' will be live-streamed ahead of the Ifa consumer electronics show in Berlin.

articles.title: Trip.com touts AI future at Forbes Thailand forum
articles.author: Puntid Tantivangphaisal
articles.summary: Trip.com has introduced TripGenie, an AI assistant designed to aid travelers in planning trips and making bookings.  AI is integrated into Trip.com's customer service, improving efficiency by over 12%. This new service aims to enhance the travel experience by offering AI-generated suggestions and streamlining the planning and booking process.

articles.title: Nykaa expands abroad, launches Kay Beauty in UK
articles.summary: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd. (Nykaa) is launching its Kay Beauty brand in the UK on Thursday, partnering with Space NK. This launch, co-created with Katrina Kaif in 2019, is part of the company's strategy to expand internationally and compete with global cosmetics giants. FSN aims to significantly increase its gross merchandise value for in-house cosmetics brands by March 2030, leveraging the growing beauty market.

articles.title: Mentos launches ‘Fresh Sounds' campaign via The Idea Shed
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Mentos has launched 'Fresh Sounds', a campaign supporting emerging Australian music talent in collaboration with The Idea Shed, Vinyl Media, Havas Media, and Havas Play. The campaign includes a Fresh Sounds Portal for artists to submit music to Rolling Stone Australia and a Fresh Sounds Hub showcasing undiscovered artists.

articles.title: Nykaa goes to the UK with Katrina Kaif's Kay Beauty brand of cosmetics
articles.author: Ht Business Desk
articles.summary: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd.'s Nykaa is launching Kay Beauty, a cosmetics brand developed with Katrina Kaif, in the UK across 13 stores and an online platform. Kay Beauty plans to sell standard cosmetics for various skin complexions and specialty items like kohl for South Asian women, aiming to expand Nykaa's presence in a competitive market.

articles.title: Hisense launches flagship UX ULED RGB-MiniLED TVs in India, starting at Rs 9.99 lakh
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Hisense has launched its flagship smart TVs (UX ULED TV series) in India. The UX series introduces RGB-MiniLED technology and comes in 100-inch and 116-inch variants. The TVs feature AI-powered processing, cinema-grade visuals, and next-level gaming performance and will be available through select offline retailers and major online platforms including Amazon and Flipkart.

articles.title: Smart carts, AI shopping assistants: A look at FairPrice Finest's 'Store of Tomorrow' at Punggol Digital District, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: FairPrice Group launched its newest FairPrice Finest outlet in Punggol Digital District, featuring AI-powered technologies under the 'Store of Tomorrow' program. Key innovations include smart carts with in-store navigation and scan-and-go functionality, as well as AI-driven recommendations for health supplements and wine. The outlet will serve as a testbed for these services, potentially rolling them out to other FairPrice outlets and businesses.

articles.title: Victoria Beckham Unveils New Foundation Launch and Announces Augustinus Bader Partnership
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Victoria Beckham Beauty is launching a new foundation on August 28th, 2025, in collaboration with Augustinus Bader. The foundation features Augustinus Bader's Trigger Complex technology and promises a natural finish with long-wear performance, available in 40 shades and priced between $60-$80.

articles.title: 6 Best Body Lotions for Smooth & Hydrated Skin
articles.summary: A new skincare line deeply hydrates and repairs skin with ceramides, offering non-greasy, fast-absorbing relief for very dry skin. The products are enriched with niacinamide and cocoa butter, feature a floral fragrance, and include a winter-ready formula with shea butter and tea tree oil, along with a water-based, non-sticky option for all skin types.

articles.title: Honor Magic V5 review: the foldable smartphone that might finally win people over
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Honor has launched the Magic V5, an ultra-thin foldable smartphone featuring a 7.95" tablet when unfolded and a sensible phone size when folded. It boasts impressive specifications such as a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 5,820mAh battery with 50W wireless charging, and a camera system with a 50MP main sensor, 64MP periscope telephoto lens, and a 50MP ultrawide sensor. The Magic V5 is priced at £1,699 in the UK.

articles.title: VML launches new campaign for Cuddly Refresh Rinse
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Cuddly, in collaboration with VML, has launched Cuddly Refresh Rinse, an odour-removing fabric rinse designed to tackle stubborn smells in laundry, particularly those from teenagers' clothing. Ashleigh Wright, Marketing Director at Colgate-Palmolive, highlights the product's unique feature as not being a fabric conditioner, but a dedicated odour remover.

articles.title: Omoda C9 is better than the Germans
articles.author: Lance Witten
articles.summary: Omoda is launching the Omoda C9, which comes in 4x2 and 4x4 petrol-powered models and a PHEV version. The Omoda C9 starts at under R800,000, with the 4x4 model fetching just shy of R890,000, while the plug-in hybrid is still under a bar.

articles.title: Samsung's Next Galaxy Unpacked Event Will Be a Sept. 4 Livestream
articles.author: Mike Sorrentino
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil new phones, devices, and a Galaxy Tab for its Galaxy line during a virtual Galaxy Unpacked event on September 4th. A new Galaxy Tab is available for reservation ahead of the event.

articles.title: 32 Things You May Have Been Avoiding Buying, But Trust Us, You Need Them
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products including Downy fabric spray, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo, The Pink Stuff's "Sqeezy" sponge set, and Mouthwatchers' flossing toothbrush. It also features WellPatch migraine/headache patches, a Dreo oscillating tower fan, Nivea skin firming gel cream, Brumate Era 40-ounce water bottle, and a Bissell multipurpose portable cleaner, offering solutions for diverse needs from personal care to home cleaning.

articles.title: SEO help
articles.summary: A new website is launching, focusing on lead generation for tradesmen in London, including plumbers and electricians. The website aims to provide a unique selling proposition (USP) within the London area.

articles.title: Richard Branson says 'dyslexia is a superpower' as new campaign launches
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Virgin StartUp, Made By Dyslexia, and Virgin Unite launched a nationwide campaign across the UK celebrating dyslexic entrepreneurs and their contributions to various inventions and businesses. The campaign highlights individuals like Jo Malone, who attributes the success of her fragrance brand to dyslexic thinking. The initiative aims to inspire the next generation of entrepreneurs by showcasing the power of 'Dyslexic Thinking'.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to unveil Galaxy S25 FE, Tab S11 next month
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. is preparing to unveil the Galaxy S.

articles.title: 31 Beauty Items To Make Even Amateurs Feel Like Pros
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: Nyx launched face glue primer for makeup. iMethod launched microblading brow pen. Color Wow launched One-Minute Transformation cream for hair. Makeup By Mario released skin enhancer. KISS launched glueless version of Falscara clusters. QUEWEL launched magnetic eyelashes. Wonderskin launched pH-activated lip and blush stick. Juvia's Place launched magic pH color-changing lip gloss. Saltair launched Body Oil. Kylie Cosmetics launched skin tint. The Frontal Queen launched Lace melting spray. Neutrogena launched makeup-correcting stick. Tower 28 launched shimmer-free translucent cream highlight balm and cream blush. One/Size launched On 'Til Dawn setting spray. CoverGirl launched Yummy Blur Lipstick. Tirtir launched foundation. Rizos Curls launched styling cream and taming wand. L'Oreal Paris launched Infallible Brow Lamination, magenta L'Oréal hair dye, illuminating moisturizer. Tymo launched straightening brush. Beachwaver launched curling iron.

articles.title: Enzyme Detergent Inspired by Noto Earthquake Works for Emergencies
articles.author: Toyohiro Ichioka
articles.summary: Ethical Japan has launched a new enzyme-based detergent designed for low-water usage, priced at ¥1,485 JPY (approximately $10 USD) for a one-week pack. This detergent is designed for use during disasters or when water is scarce, and it breaks down dirt at the molecular level, requiring minimal rinsing and being gentle on the skin.

articles.title: These 39 Practical Products Must Have Been Crafted By A Genius
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of innovative products, including an electric can opener, blackout stamp roller, keychain car escape tool, gardening gloves with claws, and a waterproof eyeliner stamp. It also features a fruit fly trap, acne patches, a water bottle cup holder adapter, an eyelash curler, a pet hair remover, and a reusable smart notebook. Additionally, the article showcases products like a Litter Robot, LED humidifier, stain lifting pads, doorstop alarm, root concealing spray, dandruff shampoo, and a fruit soft serve maker.

articles.title: LG INTRODUCES INTELLIGENT, INNOVATIVE CLEANING WITH NEW VACUUMS AT IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching four new vacuum cleaning solutions at IFA 2025, tailored for the European market. The lineup includes a robot vacuum with steam mop offering advanced features like AI-driven navigation and self-sterilization, a built-in robot vacuum station designed for space efficiency, a stick vacuum with consistent suction, and a lightweight wet-dry stick vacuum with AI Roller Control. These innovations aim to deliver enhanced convenience, powerful performance, and seamless design for European consumers.

articles.title: LG INTRODUCES INTELLIGENT, INNOVATIVE CLEANING WITH NEW VACUUMS AT IFA 2025
articles.author: LG Electronics
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching four new vacuum cleaning solutions tailored for the European market at IFA 2025. The new lineup features a robot vacuum with steam mop, a built-in robot vacuum station, a stick vacuum, and a wet-dry stick vacuum, all designed to offer enhanced convenience and powerful performance.

articles.title: Meet the Roborock H60 Hub Ultra: Cordless Cleaning with Auto-Empty Ease
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the H60 Hub Ultra, a cordless vacuum cleaner with a self-emptying dock, in Australia on August 28, 2025. The H60 Hub Ultra features powerful suction, long battery life, and a 3L dust bag and will be priced at $999.

articles.title: Singer G-Dragon shows off Korean Air's new First Class pajamas at airport
articles.summary: Korean Air introduced new in-flight amenities for First and Prestige Class passengers. These amenities include Frette loungewear and Graff amenity kits containing lip balm, hand cream and a signature fragrance. The airline increased its annual budget for these items by 20 to 50 percent per product category to enhance passenger experience.

articles.title: Realme's New Phones Get 15,000mAh Battery And Cooling Fan But You Can't Buy Them
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Realme showcased two new concept phones in China this week. These phones aim to assist users in different ways.

articles.title: Meet the Roborock H60 Hub Ultra: Cordless Cleaning with Auto-Empty Ease
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Roborock launched the H60 Hub Ultra cordless stick vacuum in Australia. The vacuum delivers deep-cleaning performance with hands-free dust disposal.

articles.title: Standalone AI Devices Are Back, Baby. The Note-Taking Plaud Note 3 Proves It
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Plaud AI has sold over a million AI devices. This indicates strong market adoption and suggests a successful product launch.

articles.title: Skunk with coffee cup on head rescued by London residents
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Tim Hortons introduced a new fall menu.

articles.title: Ditch Dyson for Amazon's cheaper price on powerful cordless vacuum
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Dyson V8 Advanced cordless stick vacuum cleaner is now available for purchase at a cheaper price on Amazon.

articles.title: New center opens to promote Longhua's smart production
articles.author: Shenzhen Daily
org: Longhua International Marketing Center for Enterprise Products
articles.summary: Longhua District has opened the Longhua International Marketing Center for Enterprise Products, a new showroom featuring advanced industries. The showroom showcases products like drones, hydrogen-powered bicycles, robots, and AI-powered Chinese language learning tools.

articles.title: Beauty shoppers who spend �10 could end up with a �480 Dyson Airwrap
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Dyson Airwrap is available through a promotional deal, offering it for 9.99 instead of 480 for shoppers. The promotion requires quick action to secure the product.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 17 Unique Accessory Revealed With Design Details In New Report
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Apple is expected to launch a new accessory alongside the new iPhones. This accessory is described as unlike anything Apple has created before.

articles.title: Netflix drops ‘Alice in Borderland' Season 3 trailer
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Netflix has released the official trailer for a new content. This indicates the upcoming launch or introduction of a new product by Netflix.

articles.title: Dentist-backed 95p teeth whitening solution shoppers say 'works from first try'
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A teeth whitening product demonstrates a visible difference after the first use, suggesting its effectiveness.

articles.title: Sony's gorgeous Ghost of Yōtei PS5 bundles finally have a pre-order date and the prices ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Sony unveiled prices and pre-order dates for the new Ghost of Yōtei PlayStation 5 hardware bundles.

articles.title: Slim-pressive
articles.author: Tushar Kanwar
articles.summary: Samsung's Z Fold 7 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite 'for Galaxy' chipset, 12GB or 16GB of memory, One UI8 on Android 16 with refined AI features from the S25 series. The device has an S2 Ultra-inspired 200-megapixel wide angle lens, a 10MP telephoto lens, and a 12MP ultrawide lens, with the price starting at Rs. 1,74,999.
